title: Update Brand Logo Across Platforms
description: A company has a new logo. A brand manager needs to ensure it is updated across all social media profiles.

tasks.description: Get the new logo file in the correct dimensions for each social platform (e.g., Facebook profile picture, Twitter header).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the required image files.

tasks.description: Log in to each social media platform and upload the new logo to the appropriate profile sections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the logo on all platforms.

tasks.description: Verify that the new logo is displaying correctly on all public-facing profiles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks each profile to confirm the update was successful.
